globalProperty.value: select distinct p.uuid as uuid, concat(pn.given_name," ", ifnull(pn.family_name,'')) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NAME_KEY', getPatientPhoneNumber(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_PHONE_NUMBER_KEY', getPatientAge(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_AGE_KEY', p.gender as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_GENDER_KEY', getNumberOfContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NR_CONTACTS_KEY', concat( getNumberOfEnrolledContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id), "/", getNumberOfContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id)) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NR_ENROL_CONTACTS_KEY' from person p join person_name pn on p.person_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 and p.voided=0 where patientIsIndex(p.person_id) AND (getNumberOfContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id) = 0 or getNumberOfEnrolledContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id) < getNumberOfContactsRelatedToIndex(p.person_id)) order by p.date_created desc;

select distinct pi.identifier as ID, concat("",p.uuid) as uuid, concat(pn.given_name," ", ifnull(pn.family_name,'')) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NAME_KEY', ' ' as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_INDEX_NAME_KEY', ' ' as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_INDEX_RELATIONSHIP_KEY', getPatientPhoneNumber(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_PHONE_NUMBER_KEY', getPatientAge(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_AGE_KEY', p.gender as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_GENDER_KEY', getPatientMostRecentProgramAttributeValueFromName(p.person_id, 'PROGRAM_MANAGEMENT_1_NOTIFICATION_METHOD') as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NOTIFICATION_METHOD_KEY', getPatientMostRecentProgramAttributeValueFromName(p.person_id, 'PROGRAM_MANAGEMENT_2_NOTIFICATION_DATE') as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NOTIFICATION_DATE_KEY', getPatientMostRecentProgramAttributeValueFromName(p.person_id, 'PROGRAM_MANAGEMENT_3_NOTIFICATION_OUTCOME') as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NOTIFICATION_OUTCOME_KEY', 0 as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_TEST_DATE_KEY', 0 as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_TEST_PLACE_KEY', 0 as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_TEST_FACILITY_KEY', 0 as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_TEST_RESULT_KEY', 0 as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_ARV_START_DATE_KEY', getPatientMostRecentProgramAttributeValueFromName(p.person_id, 'PROGRAM_MANAGEMENT_4_CONTACT_TRACER') as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_CONTACT_TRACER_KEY', getPatientMostRecentProgramAttributeValueFromName(p.person_id, 'PROGRAM_MANAGEMENT_5_COMMENTS') as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_COMMENTS_KEY', getPatientARTNumber(p.person_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_ART_NUMBER_KEY' from person p join person_name pn on p.person_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 and p.voided=0 join patient_identifier pi on p.person_id = pi.patient_id and pi.voided=0 join patient_identifier_type pit on pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id join global_property gp on gp.property="bahmni.primaryIdentifierType" and gp.property_value=pit.uuid where patientIsContact(p.person_id) and getPatientMostRecentProgramOutcome(p.person_id, ${language}, 'INDEX_TESTING_PROGRAM_KEY') is null order by p.date_created desc;
